Title: Creates an affordable housing insurance relief fund program
Summary: Creates an affordable housing insurance relief fund program to provide grants to eligible projects for reasonable and necessary commercial insurance expenses.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1301 - 1308, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to creating an affordable housing insurance relief fund program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
